title: Ward Skin option sometime greys out in Champ select

replies.body: I can confirm this happening throughout all of champ select.
Thank you! Is this occurring every game for you, or just randomly?
(Sorry, didn't check the boards.) Sporadically. I haven't had it happen since, so I couldn't take a screenshot for you. Sorry. >.<
No worries! If you see it again, feel free to post!

Hey KateyKhaos, I just got the bug again. I'm unsure if it's relevant, but you may note we both use the penguin ward.
[Link](http://i.imgur.com/gSnQThw.jpg)  and again while I was trying to compose this message. [Link](http://i.imgur.com/6QmkUda.png)

Would you, by any chance, be able to grab me air client logs from the game/games you experienced this in? 

You can find the logs here - C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\[VERSION NUMBER]\deploy\logs\

Hello again KateyKhaos,

There does not appear to be a file for that game. 
I only have one file from that date and it was timestamped at 18:39 while the game was at 20:54.
There are also no files for the following day, but I know I played numerous times. I have not experienced the bug since.

Hiya! 

Would you mind attaching it? We can mull through it and see if there's any helpful data. ^-^ I'm not entirely how this stuff is saved. D: Let's start with the first log you have and we can take it from there.

I don't really know how to use the forum yet, I'm sort of new, so here is a pastie of the log for you.
[Pastie](http://pastie.org/private/6ad2huuepthz3nlgo0bpiw)
I hope this is an acceptable format.
This is perfect, thank you! :D

Hmm. That's interesting. 

I was talking to the dudes who work on this feature, and there may be a potential issue of your ISP not connecting to x feature, or disconnecting to the feature. Buuut, if this is happening on a more solid consistency, it may not be. 

Lemme follow up with them today with the additional info! Thanks! ^-^
Has been happening to me too, seems to be random.
Thanks, I couldn't reproduce it in my last few games

Phew! Okay, well, if you see it happening again, feel free to comment on this post again, or make a new one! I passed this onto the team working on this feature, so they're poking around to see if it's anything on their end as well. 

Thanks again for the report!

Hey Face The Win - 

Is this occurring during the entire champion select, or as the game is counting down to begin? Any additional info you can provide would be wicked helpful in getting a solid repro for this! ^-^
IIRC when it does happen, it's greyed at all points of champ select, but i'll update this post for confirmation after playing more games today.
That'd be great, thanks!

It has been confirmed

> [{quoted}](name=CaodeKitsune,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lyt0jofj,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-02-25T14:40:15.407+0000)
>
> I can confirm this happening throughout all of champ select.
Thanks! We're taking a look to see if we can get a solid repro.
This happens to me as well, and it isn't any specific ward skin as I only only own the base one and the lowest tiered one for ranked team play.
This has happened to me too

Is it because you don't have ward skins? I don't so I can see why it grays out.
#BrokeCollegeStudent
i get this too
